official_title: A bill to include Puerto Rico within the definition of State for purposes of the requirement imposed on the Secretary of the Treasury to withhold State income taxes from the income of Federal employees.

summary.text: Revises the definition of a State to include Puerto Rico for purposes of the requirement imposed on the Secretary of the Treasury to withhold State income taxes from the income of Federal employees.

titles.title: A bill to include Puerto Rico within the definition of State for purposes of the requirement imposed on the Secretary of the Treasury to withhold State income taxes from the income of Federal employees.
